content:
SystemWebSectionGroup Class

Definition

Allows the user to programmatically access the system.web group of the configuration file. This class cannot be inherited.

In this Article

public sealed class SystemWebSectionGroup : System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup
Inheritance
Object
System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup
SystemWebSectionGroup

Inherited Members

ForceDeclaration()
ForceDeclaration(Boolean)
IsDeclarationRequired
IsDeclared
Name
SectionGroupName
SectionGroups
Sections
ShouldSerializeSectionGroupInTargetVersion(FrameworkName)
Type
Equals(Object)
Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
ToString()

Remarks

The SystemWebSectionGroup class refers to the system.web group within a configuration file. You can use this type to access any of the sections contained in this group.

Constructors

SystemWebSectionGroup()

Creates a new instance of SystemWebSectionGroup.

public SystemWebSectionGroup ();

Remarks

This constructor is called by the ASP.NET configuration system and is not intended to be used directly from your code. You can obtain an instance of the SystemWebSectionGroup class by using the GetSectionGroup method.
